descriptionHtml:
Add Diversity to the guards of Skyrim!Now Imperial Holds will have female guards and all holds now have guards that reflect their populations.

Whiterun has Nords, Bretons, Imperials, and Redguards.
The Rift has Argonians, Imperial, Darkelves, Nords, and Woodelves.
The Reach has Imperials, Breton, Redguard, Nords, and Orcs.
Haafingar has Nords, Bretons, Imperials, and Redguards.
The other holds have no new races.

THIS IS AN IMPORTED MOD FROM THE SPECIAL EDITION CREATED BY TEXASHOKIES
author: Texashokies
